mapper.insert: insert into membertbl(custno, custname, phone, address, joindate, grade, city) values(#{custno}, #{custname}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{joindate}, #{grade}, #{city})
mapper.select: select custno, custname, phone, address, joindate, grade, city from membertbl where custno=#{custno}
mapper.update: update membertbl set city=#{city} where custno=#{custno}
